Class Game

java.lang.Object
Game
public class Game
extends java.lang.Object
Overall class to run game. -Initializes players, card and board -Loops through players to run game -Checks if game is finished

    • makeDropDown

      public static <T> T makeDropDown​(T[] options, java.lang.String title, java.lang.String message)
      Create a dropdown to get the player to choose one of the provided options.
      Type Parameters:
      T - the type of object of the options
      Parameters:
      options - the options the player can choose from
      title - the title on the popup box
      message - the message above the dropdown
      Returns:
      the option that was chosen by the player

    • setupGame

      public static void setupGame() throws java.io.IOException
      Setup the game to be ready to be played. - Sets game over to false - Creates board - Creates players - Deals cards to players
      Throws:
      java.io.IOException - thrown if a file cannot be found.
